properties.description: Monday, Tuesday and Thursday: 10.00am - 4.00pm. Our space is located in the heart of Swansea on the High Street. It spans over 2 floors and has an open-plan set up which can be used for multiple functions. We also have a small kitchen and refreshments (teas, coffees, biscuits). On arrival, you will be met by one of friendly staff and volunteers who will guide you to the sign in sheet. Everyone is welcome to our space and can use it as frequently as they would like. , (We unfortunately do not have wheelchair access however. Apologies for any inconveniences this might cause people.) ; Free wifi; Free charging points for phones or other devices; Free use of computers / devices; Toilets; Accessible toilets; Car parking; Games / board games; Outdoor space; Refreshments available; tea, coffee and biscuits ; ; Drinking water available; Visitors welcome to bring own food / drinks; Food bank / food share; Tuesday between 11.30am and 1.00pm; ; Free period products;

properties.description: 7 days a week. Midday - 10.00pm. Copr Bar is a licensed cafe serving hot food and drinks. It has sofas, ample seating and chairs, a piano and provides an independent and friendly welcome. SA1UTE military charity is also based at Copr and often hosts free coffee mornings - kept an eye out for on social media or inside the premises. SA1UTE/COPR also operate a Pay it Forward scheme where members of the public donate to the charity/business and they turn each Â£5 into a hot meal, treat, hot drink. This scheme is operating currently and is open to anyone in a vulnerable position. ; Free wifi; Free charging points for phones or other devices; Accessible entrance / venue; Toilets; Accessible toilets; Baby changing facilities; Children's play area; Games / board games; Outdoor space; Refreshments available; the premises offers a full menu of food and drinks to purchase; Copr operates a Pay it Forward scheme where people can approach the bar and ask if there are any funds in reserve to help people in a vulnerable position; ; Drinking water available; Book borrowing / book swap; Television; Advice, information and signposting; SA1UTE charity is based at Copr and has links with many other support groups in the community.; ;

properties.description: Monday, 1.00pm - 3.30pm, Friday, 11.00am - 3.00pm (on Friday only tea and coffee are served) There will be free refreshments and a number of activities on hand for all to enjoy. Why not come along and make new friends, keep warm with a nice bowl of soup. There will be puzzle books, newspapers, free wifi with computers available, dominoes, cards, board games and jigsaws. If you like to knit we have needles and yarn available or you can bring your own project. Our aim is to provide you with a warm welcoming space and a volunteer will be on hand so you will always have company if you are feeling lonely or isolated. ; Free wifi; Free charging points for phones or other devices; Free use of computers / devices; Accessible entrance / venue; Toilets; Accessible toilets; Baby changing facilities; Games / board games; Refreshments available; Monday - free soup and bread/roll, tea and coffee; Friday - free tea and coffee; between Tuesday and Friday our on-site cafe is open serving various paid for meals and snacks; ; Drinking water available; Food bank / food share; food bank is available on Wednesday (other days if emergencies arise); ; Free period products; Book borrowing / book swap; Newspapers / magazines;
